problem_text_cn: 如图,大小两个量角器的零度线都在直线AB上,而且小量角器的中心在大量角器的外边缘上．如果它们外边缘上的公共点P在大量角器上对应的度数为50°,那么∠PBA为的度数()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the zero-degree lines of the two protractors are on the straight line AB, and the center of the small protractor is on the outer edge of the large protractor. If the common point P on their outer edges corresponds to a degree of N_0 on a large number of anglers, then ∠PBA is the degree ()
raw_answer: 解:连接O~1~P、AP、PO~2~．∵AO~2~是⊙O~1~的直径,∴∠APO~2~=90°(直径所对的圆周角是直角)；又∵O~2~P=O~2~B(⊙O~2~的半径),∴∠PBA=∠O~2~PB(等边对等角),∵∠PO~1~B=50°(已知),∴∠PAB=25°(同弧所对的圆周角是所对的圆心角的一半),∴∠PO~2~A=90°-∠PO~1~B=65°(直角三角形的两个锐角互余),∴∠PBA=\frac{1}{2}∠PO~2~A=32.5°；故选:B．
